wecreate.subtitle: We are startup studio that develops and launches new companies.

whoweare.title: Who we are
whoweare.subtitle: We create products that have innovation and technology at their core. We value working with talented people that understand the possibilities of today.

info: Startups create a world that actually is better. Any problem that can be solved, will be solved by a startup, and that is a huge opportunity.
whowearelist: We develop innovative products, systems and services
Next we build teams to scale them into companies
Each startup solving one problem at a time

ourcorelist.title: Innovation
ourcorelist.text: Startupz operates where entrepreneurship and technology intersect. We design solutions and turn them into businesses models.

ourcorelist.title: People
ourcorelist.text: Talent is what enable us to create great companies.

ourworkslist.tolq: Tolq is the translation solution built for e-commerce. It provides all pieces of the localization puzzle in one single integrated solution.
ourworkslist.feedbacklabs: Feedback Labs turns feedback into actionable insights for your team.
ourworkslist.codekeeper: Codekeeper is an all-in-one solution for software developers and publishers to provide source code escrow as part of service level and license agreements.
ourworkslist.legalsite: Protected against legal risks, privacy compliant and always up-to-date with the latest regulatory developments.

wearehiring.title: We are hiring
wearehiring.subtitle: We're always looking for talented people to join and help build our startups. Check out our current openings

formpage.title: Are you ready to board this rocket ship?
formpage.subtitle: Share your excitement with us.

assistant.firstline: Hi! I am Ben, your virtual assistant.
assistant.secondline: How can I make your day better?
